info.brief_description: 3rd part of The Time I Was series.  You switch bodies with a body part.  Uses the BSM.
info.description:
Welcome to Part 3 of my series, The Time I Was a Body Part!
You, as usual, are Austin. Note: uses the same characters as The Time I Was Someone Else. They are:
Jessica, your 5-year-old little sister
Madge, your 70-year-old grandmother
Avah, your 8-month-old niece (I found out the correct spelling of her name!)
Kari, your 18-year-old big sister
Hannah, Jessica's 5-year-old BFF
Martha, the now 14-year-old know-it-all from school
Mom, now 48 years old (her name is Carol)
Erika, your 13-year-old girlfriend from school
Ann, your 28-year-old big sister
Madi, your now 5-year-old cousin

I'm adding characters, too:
Bill, your 71-year-old grandfather
Andrew, your 6-year-old nephew
Chris, your 20-year-old prison familiar big brother
Terry, your 57-year-old father
Billy, your 26-year-old big brother
William, your now 6-year-old cousin
Paul, your 31-year-old big brother
Tim, your 28-year-old big brother
John, your 22-year-old big brother

The old rules still apply, so, have fun!

EDIT: PLEASE add! Aiming for 50+ chapters!

EDIT: cheapscape28, I would like you to stop adding these extremely short chapters to my interactives! Sorry, but I just do NOT like them.
